# import pandas module 
import pandas as pd 
    
# making dataframe 
df = pd.read_csv("../input/covid19-cough-audio-classification/metadata_compiled.csv") 
   
# output the dataframe
df.drop(columns = [
 'datetime',
 'latitude',
 'longitude',
 'age',
 'quality_1',
 'cough_type_1',
 'dyspnea_1',
 'wheezing_1',
 'stridor_1',
 'choking_1',
 'congestion_1',
 'nothing_1',
 'diagnosis_1',
 'severity_1',
 'quality_2',
 'cough_type_2',
 'dyspnea_2',
 'wheezing_2',
 'stridor_2',
 'choking_2',
 'congestion_2',
 'nothing_2',
 'diagnosis_2',
 'severity_2',
 'quality_3',
 'cough_type_3',
 'dyspnea_3',
 'wheezing_3',
 'stridor_3',
 'choking_3',
 'congestion_3',
 'nothing_3',
 'diagnosis_3',
 'severity_3',
 'quality_4',
 'cough_type_4',
 'dyspnea_4',
 'wheezing_4',
 'stridor_4',
 'choking_4',
 'congestion_4',
 'nothing_4',
 'diagnosis_4',
 'severity_4'], inplace = True)
df.drop(df[df['status'].isna() == True].index, inplace = True)
#print(df.size)
#print(df)
df.to_csv('mycsvfile.csv',index=False)

dfhealthy = df[df['status'] == 'healthy']
dfhealthy.to_csv('healthy.csv',index=False)
dfcovid = df[df['status'] == 'COVID-19']
dfcovid.to_csv('covid.csv',index=False)
dfsympto = df[df['status'] == 'symptomatic']
dfsympto.to_csv('symptomatic.csv',index=False)

source.6ba4ec6a:
import os
import shutil
import pandas as pd
#dfcovid = pd.read_csv("path/covid.csv")
#dfsympto = pd.read_csv("path/symptomatic.csv")
#dfhealthy = pd.read_csv("path/healthy.csv")
#os.makedirs('/kaggle/working/Healthy_records/', mode = 0o666)
#os.makedirs('/kaggle/working/COVID_records/', mode = 0o666)
#os.makedirs('/kaggle/working/Symptomatic_records/', mode = 0o666)
source = '/kaggle/input/covid19-cough-audio-classification/'
healthy = '/kaggle/working/Healthy_records/'
covid = '/kaggle/working/COVID_records/'
sympto = '/kaggle/working/Symptomatic_records/'
#listoffiles = os.listdir('/kaggle/input/covid19-cough-audio-classification')

for _,_,filenames in os.walk('/kaggle/input/covid19-cough-audio-classification'):
    for file in filenames:
        fileExt=os.path.splitext(file)[-1]
        file_uid = os.path.splitext(file)[0]
        if (fileExt == '.webm' or fileExt == '.ogg'):
            if file_uid in dfcovid.uuid.values:
                #shutil.move(source + file, covid)
                shutil.copy(source + file, covid)
            elif file_uid in dfsympto.uuid.values:
                #shutil.move(source + file, sympto)
                shutil.copy(source + file, sympto)
            else:
                #shutil.move(source + file, healthy)
                shutil.copy(source + file, healthy)
source.0fc92edf: The above code can be used to extract data form JSON file ../input/covid19-cough-audio-classification/metadata_compiled.csv

source.09c76668:
# Python program to read
# json file


import json

# Opening JSON file
f = open('../input/covid19-cough-audio-classification/00014dcc-0f06-4c27-8c7b-737b18a2cf4c.json')

# returns JSON object as
# a dictionary
data = json.load(f)

print(data['cough_detected'])

# Closing file
f.close()
